snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel said Monday that he was shaking up the bureaucracy responsible for recovering and identifying the remains of war dead by collapsing it into a single office.
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel announces overhaul of Pentagon agencies responsible for recovering and identifying the remains of war dead by collapsing it into a single office.
